Projects

  • Salvapatas
    GitHub

    Salvapatas is a proof-of-concept web app built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS to help locate missing animals.

  • Gatsby Florist Patch
    GitHub

    gatsby e-commerce open-source
  • Grupo 5 Miraflores
